subject: Follow up on return
description_text:
Hello Simsonns Team, i just wanna do a quick follow on my returnment of
order if it has shipped to you or not. Thanks
#SSN2868

conversations.body_text: Hi cheese burger,​ here is your parcel tracking link. I see it has already been delivered.  https://www.dhl.com/us-en/home/tracking.html?tracking-id=CE326626930DE

I ment that i am returning a product of you and i just wanted to check if u
guys have received it yet or not.

service@simsonn.com
Please provide the return tracking number so we may verify with our warehouse.

Here of the Austrian POST:

CA472334786AT

service@simsonn.com

Just wanted to check in, the package arrived already on the 16.10.2025

chees burger <somegaming877@gmail.com> schrieb am Di. 21. Okt. 2025 um
20:31:

>
> Here of the Austrian POST:
>
> CA472334786AT
>
> service@simsonn.com

Hi chees burger,    We sincerely apologize for the delay. We are currently confirming with our German warehouse. If the product return is approved, we will process your refund tomorrow. Please rest assured.

Hello, any news about my money??

service@simsonn.com
Hi chees burger,    We have processed your refund, which should appear in your account within two business days. Please check your account.
